wikipedia_page.main: George Hughes  (August 19, 1925 – February 5, 2009) was a guard who played five seasons in the National Football League with the Pittsburgh Steelers. Hughes attended the College of William and Mary. He died February 5, 2009 at the VA Medical Center in Hampton.Hughes was inducted into the Virginia Sports Hall of Fame in 1983.

*George Hughes (ice hockey) (born 1988), American professional ice hockey defenceman
*George Hughes (rugby) (1870–1947), rugby union footballer of the 1890s for England, and Barrow
*George Hughes (1889–1930), African American lynched in Sherman, Texas
